Summary Note:
De Jong Van Dijk Maassen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Amsterdam. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
With a career spanning nearly 13 years, De Jong Van Dijk Maassen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: De Jong Van Dijk Maassen is married to Evelien. Together they have 1 kid called Charlotte.
Education Background:
In 2007, De Jong finished his secondary school education at RSG Magister Almelo.
De Jong attended Tio University of Applied Sciences and graduated in 2010.
Occupation History:
De Jong Van Dijk Maassen is a seasoned professional with over 13 years of experience.
De Jong Van Dijk Maassen launched his career as a Assistant Designer at Victor & Rolf B.V., where he gained valuable experience from 2012 to 2017.
His subsequent role was as a Senior Designer at 10 Feather Corporation B.V., where he continued to grow professionally from 2019 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 90000 EUR.
He has house located in The Hague, worth 2020000 EUR.

He inherited 1760000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Real Estate Developer, in 2019, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
